content: There’s always someone, a cause. The deep that carries into the deep. A mountain welcoming all molehills. There’s always someone… And, that someone may not know they’re your someone. You may not know you’re theirs. The two of you, shy-in-wait, unable to speak what has already been spoken, so you make up stories as to what you are supposed to be, but leave out all of the reasons why you cannot be.
